sentences.en: According to the Lancet, malnutrition in the first two years is irreversible.
sentences.cn: 根据《柳叶刀》的报导,在头两年内, 营养不良是不可逆的.

sentences.en: Broadsword has many kinds, lancet broadsword, double broadsword, belt broadsword, tiger head broadsword, money broadsword etc.
sentences.cn: 刀,分为很多种, 有柳叶刀 、 双刀 、 腰带刀 、 虎头刀 、 金钱刀等种类.

sentences.en: He fears the lancet of my art as I fear that of his . The cold steelpen.
sentences.cn: 他惧怕我的艺术尖刀,正如我害怕他的冷酷无情的钢笔.

sentences.en: Lancet is asleep on the rug.
sentences.cn: 朗赛特正睡在小地毯上.

sentences.en: The doctor drew the lancet out slowly from the patient's stomach.
sentences.cn: 医生慢慢地把手术刀从病人的胃里拉出来。

sentences.en: The findings, from Uganda, are in the medical journal lancet, The Lancet.
sentences.cn: 这些发现来自乌干达的一份医药刊物--柳叶刀.

sentences.en: The findings, from Uganda, are in the medical journal, Lancet.
sentences.cn: 研究结果出自乌干达并刊登在医学期刊《柳叶刀》上.

sentences.en: The growing problem is underlined in the latest issue of the Lancet.
sentences.cn: 最近一期的《柳叶刀》杂志中强调了这一日益严重的问题。

sentences.en: The report a ears in the September i ue of The Lancet Oncology.
sentences.cn: 报告刊登在柳叶刀肿瘤学9月号上.

sentences.en: The research from Southampton General Hospital is published in the Lancet.
sentences.cn: 这份出自南安普敦综合医院的研究,发表在《刺胳针》期刊上.

sentences.en: The study and editorial appear online in The Lancet.
sentences.cn: 这项研究和评论同时发表在《柳叶刀》上.
该研究发表于《柳叶刀》中.

sentences.en: The study appeared in the Lacent Lancet medical journal which published a special issue on disability.
sentences.cn: 这篇研究刊登在一本名为《柳叶刀》的医学杂志上关于残疾的特刊上.

sentences.en: The study is in the Lancet medical journal.
sentences.cn: 研究结果刊登在柳叶刀医学杂志.

sentences.en: The work appears in the May 16 Lancet.
sentences.cn: 这项研究发表于5月16日出版的《刺络针》.

words.tran_cn: 以长矛攻击；用柳叶刀割开；冲进
小刀，[外科]柳叶刀；[建]尖顶窗；小枪

trans.tran_en: a small very sharp pointed knife with two cutting edges, used by doctors to cut skin and flesh
